divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my girlfriend were driving home from Angola and we got about 10 miles from Lagrange we both seen a very bright white light that was hovering about a mile above the ground . It was moving back and forth and the light would get brighter as it got closer and dimmer as it got farther away . There were no planes or anything else near this object. It lasted about an hour and it finally disapeared into the sky. My girlfriend was Freaking out but I thought it was pretty neat .
trends: There has been one other sighting in LaGrange
There were no other sightings in LaGrange on or around May 3rd 2012
Summary: Very awesome to watch lots of movement and great lights .
